meta_title: How to Improve PM Compliance: 5 Steps to 90%+ Reliability
meta_description: Improve PM compliance by eliminating low-value tasks, ranking asset criticality, and applying the 10% rule. Break the reactive cycle with these 5 proven steps.
title: How to Improve Preventive Maintenance (PM) Compliance

hero_image.alt: Hero image for How to Improve Preventive Maintenance (PM) Compliance

image_prompt: A high-tech maintenance planning room in a modern factory. A diverse team of reliability engineers is looking at a large digital dashboard showing a "PM Compliance" gauge at 96%. In the background, through a glass window, a clean and organized production floor is visible with technicians using tablets to verify completed tasks. The lighting is bright and professional, emphasizing data-driven precision.
